detail_desc: Cheeky briefs in microfibre and lace with a lined gusset, laser-cut edges at the front and a high cut at the back.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print and reversible sequin motif (size 2-3Y with normal sequins). Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Gently tailored jacket in woven fabric with a metal fastener at the front, welt front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with gathered seems. Lined.

Wide dress in an airy, patterned weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and a seam at the waist. Decorative frills around the neckline, on the front and sleeves and at the hem, and flounced cuffs. Jersey underdress.
Baby Exclusive. Romper suit in jacquard-knit organic cotton with long raglan sleeves, and buttons on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Sarong in an airy patterned weave with short fringing along the edges. Can be worn in three different ways: around the hips, as a dress or as a wrapover top. Size 130x150 cm.
Blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with fringe details, a round neckline with an opening and ties at front and short, smock-trimmed puff sleeves.
Cropped T-shirt in jersey with a chest pocket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Lace Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Hat in braided straw containing some glittery threads. Braided cord with appliqués around the brim. Width of brim 8.5 cm.
Hoop earrings in steel and recycled zinc. Size approx. 2.5 cm.

Shirt in softly draping viscose twill with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets, a seam with a drawstring under the bust and long sleeves with a tab and button and buttoned cuffs. Rounded hem.

Trousers in soft washed cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, fake fly with a button, zipped side pockets, welt back pockets and slim, shaped legs with stitching on the knees and elasticated hems.

Oxford cotton shirt with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Slightly longer cardigan in soft, fine-knit slub yarn with low dropped shoulders and short sleeves. No buttons.
Vest top in jersey crêpe with scalloped trims.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, a lined, wrapover hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Chimi x H&M. We have teamed up with Chimi Eyewear to create three updated versions of the brand’s iconic sunglasses. This style has a robust, square silhouette with flat lenses. The frames are made from high-quality cellulose acetate that is both BPA- and phthalate-free. The lenses have UV 400 filters for 100% UV-protection, and the sidepieces and front are connected with seven-barrel stainless steel hinges. Text print on the inside of one sidepiece. Supplied with a hard case, cleaning cloth and a drawstring bag. Available in three summery pastel shades as well as in stylish black. Total width 14.2 cm.
Top in soft pile with a hood, kangaroo pocket, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.

Baby Exclusive. Fine-knit all-in-one suit in soft, warming merino wool with buttons at the top, crotch and down the inside of the legs. Long raglan sleeves and long legs. Narrow ribbed trim around the neckline, cuffs and hems.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with narrow sides, cutaway coverage at the back and a low waist with covered elastication.
Short top in ribbed, organic cotton jersey with a wide, round neckline, short sleeves and decorative buttons down the front.
Shorts in an airy, patterned weave with an elasticated waist, and decorative frills and a sewn-in wrapover at the sides.
Chinos in a stretch cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, a zip fly and button, and tapered legs. Decorative coin pocket, diagonal side pockets and fake jetted back pockets.
Short coat in soft, felted fabric with notch lapels and a large, detachable faux fur collar. Concealed press-studs down the front, welt side pockets and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Lined.
Cropped top in soft jersey with raw, rolled edges.

Short dress in an airy, patterned weave made from organic cotton and Tencel™ lyocell. Deep V-neck at the back, short, voluminous puff sleeves with narrow elastication, and a seam at the waist with a wide, detachable tie belt. Unlined.
Shorts in soft cotton piqué with an elasticated waist and fake fly with a decorative button. Side pockets, a fake flap pocket with a button front and back, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Padded ski trousers in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with closed, waterproof seams at critical points. Zip fly and press-stud, zipped side pockets, a flap back pocket with a press-stud, and reinforced hems with snow flaps. Detachable, adjustable elastic braces. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Scarf in a softly draping, patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 55x55 cm.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft knit with a round neckline and ribbed trims.
Pyjama shorts in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist.
Warm-lined ankle boots in imitation suede with a zip at the back. Faux fur linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles. Heel 3 cm.
Knee-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a frill-trimmed V-neck and sewn-in wrapover front. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs and a seam and drawstring under the bust. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with ribbed panels at the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slim Fit.

department_name: Sneakers small girl inactive from s2
detail_desc: Cotton canvas trainers with elasticated lacing at the front, a loop at the back, canvas linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Underwired bra in lace with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back, and a wide lace trim at the hem.

Round bag in braided paper straw with a zip at the top and one inner compartment. Narrow metal chain shoulder strap and metal rings at the sides that can be pulled up and used as handles. Lined. Depth 6 cm. Diameter 21 cm.
Alice band in padded velour with shimmering beads on top.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.

Short, straight-cut coat in a sturdy wool blend with concealed press-studs at the front and a tie belt attached to the sides. Pockets in the side seams and one inner pocket. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled.
Socks in a soft fine-knit with a print motif and elasticated tops.

Soft, non-wired lace bra that gives the bust a natural shape and light support. Lined front with a frill at the top and along the narrow shoulder straps. Fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Dress in an airy cotton weave with buttons down the front, short raglan sleeves, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Vest top in soft jersey made from an organic cotton blend.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with appliqués on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket, low-rise jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, and super-skinny legs.
Trunks in stretch organic cotton jersey with flatlock seams for added comfort, an elasticated waist, lined front and slightly longer legs.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Trainers in cotton canvas with imitation leather details, a padded top edge, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck opening and ties at the neckline. Pleated stand-up collar and a pleated trim around the armholes. Lined.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, pockets in the side seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with a high elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and elasticated hems. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper knitted in a soft cotton blend containing some alpaca wool with pattern-knit sections and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Running tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband with a concealed drawstring, a zip at the hems and reflective details.
Scarves in patterned satin that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 30x80 cm.
Block-coloured jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Skinny-fit, ankle-length trousers with a high, adjustable, elasticated waist, zip in one side and narrow hems.
Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a narrow cut at the top and racer back. Relaxed fit.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton jersey with a collar, button placket and slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved polo shirt in premium cotton jersey with a ribbed collar, button placket and short slits in the sides.

Short dress in airy, pattern-weave cotton with inset lace sections and a V-neck front and back with a wide lace trim. Dropped shoulders and short raglan sleeves with narrow cuffs. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a wide flounce at the hem. Lined.

Cropped top in soft sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered text motif at the top and a jersey-lined hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and an elasticated hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Set with a dress and leggings in soft organic cotton jersey. Dress with long sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist. Leggings with an elasticated waist.

Wide jacket in soft, heavily draping twill with a collar, concealed buttons down the front, a flap chest pocket with a button and large flap front pockets with a button. Shoulder tabs with a button, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and an elasticated seam at the waist. Double-layered front with an asymmetric hem. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with embroidery and a text print on the front. Jersey-lined, drawstring hood, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and rounded hems.
Long-sleeved top in thin cotton jersey with ribbed cuffs.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with reversible sequins on the front and short slits in the sides.
Trainers with a padded edge and tongue, and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Fully lined swimsuit with lightly padded cups, concealed elastication under the bust and a low-cut back.
Thin, knee-length coat in woven fabric with notch lapels, front pockets and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs. No fasteners. Unlined.
Bucket hat in cotton twill with an embroidered detail on the front.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with frills and press-studs on the shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
Top in soft jersey with narrow shoulder straps that join to create a racer back. Overlocked edges at the hem.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar and classic front. Yoke at the back, a chest pocket, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Straight-style top in jersey crêpe with a boat neck. Short, wide sleeves with pleats and double-layered trims.
Joggers in washed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and tapered legs with decorative stitching at the knees and ribbed hems.
Swimsuit with crossover frills at the front that continue back over the shoulders. Lined gusset.
